text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Wooaah!! It’s so big and spacious! So this is the Luxurious 
Cruise Journey, huh?! Thanks for inviting me, Top Road!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! I'm glad you were able to come! 
Let's make some "Summer Memories" together!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
They have a boarding party, fireworks show, optional island
tours, and a summer festival! This is going to be so much fun♪
Wait, what's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
The "Andromeda Galaxy" is coming. Therefore, this may 
be "EXDFF"... Recommending formulation of a "Plan B."

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The sun, the sea, and yours truly! Ah, everything shines so 
brilliantly! Doto, Ayabe-san! Make sure not to burn your eyes!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: O-Okay... Opera O-san, the sun, and this ship are all so pretty...

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Exactly! Nothing can hinder our radiance!
Hahaha! Shadows and storms, come if you dare!!

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, they actually came!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I can’t believe this... That typhoon suddenly
changed course and headed straight for us...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
The party, fireworks, and the optional tour
—all canceled it seems.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: (Aww man, Top Road was so excited too! She was hanging weather charms in her room for good luck, but she's probably going to be sad about this...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
The weather may be disappointing, but our trip is still on! 
Let's change our mindset and enjoy what the cruise has to offer!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Woah, that was quick! 
Is your mental strength indestructible or something?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
She’s got a good point! This is a luxury cruise after all! 
It’s filled with plenty of gorgeous amenities for us to enjoy!
Alright, let's make the most of this trip! Whoo!
text_block_list.name: Miracle & Top Road
Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Target in sight.

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Bravo!! Having a stage on a boat isn’t so bad, wouldn’t you agree?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, this is so soothing... 
This truly does have it’s own charm, wouldn’t you say?

text_block_list.name: Passenger A
text_block_list.text:
Aww, I came here hoping to make some summer memories, 
but it doesn't seem much different from my normal days off...

text_block_list.name: Passenger B
text_block_list.text:
Well, there's nothing we can do about the weather. 
Guess it was just bad luck, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
...Um, I have a suggestion. How about we 
create these "summer memories" ourselves?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I’ve got an idea! The "Let's Make Summer Memories Plan." 
Would you be willing to go along with that?

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Of course I would! What kind of performance did you have in mind? 
Turandot? Aida? A Midsummer Night's Dream? I’m fine with anything!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I'll help too. I have a feeling that if I leave
this to her, something bad might happen.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Umm, I may not be able to help much...
or even at all, but I’ll do my best...!

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe is also in the affirmative. She seeks the "gateway 
to summer" as well, so that she too may create these "memories."

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Understood. I was also instructed by Rudolf 
to "create summer memories together."

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I agree! Let’s make this a summer to 
remember and do something extra special!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Jeez, everyone’s working together so easily. 
You’re super popular, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, everyone’s so nice and kind. Now, the question is, 
what should we do...? Considering the circumstances, 
maybe we should have a live performance.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
A live performance with a song with summer vibes? That alone 
might not be enough... We didn't bring any costumes either.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe has a suggestion. We should "evoke" the wide-ranging 
summer customs throughout Japan through straightforward 
choreography, allowing for various "interactive" possibilities.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: She will also provide "maintenance" for your "costumes."

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text:
The "perfect number" will be accomplished in order to 
achieve these "summer memories." The best answer is...
...a Bon Dance Festival!
text_block_list.name: Miracle, Doto & Vega
Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
The Bon Dance Festival is happening in the dining hall. Various snacks, 
such as chocolate bananas and candy apples are also available.

text_block_list.name: T. M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This feast is the true Midsummer Night's Dream!
Let's all dance the night away!

text_block_list.name: Passenger A
text_block_list.text: Haha, a summer festival on a ship feels odd, but not so bad either.

text_block_list.name: Passenger B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I feel like I’m going to remember this for a while...
Hahaha, why don’t we dance the night away together?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Top Road, you’re a great leader and an optimist, huh? 
You’ve got incredible mental strength and, with 
a single word, you can make everyone follow you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: N-No way, I’m nothing like that! I was just feeling a little down is all...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
When it started to rain, memories started to flood back... 
I thought, "Ever since I was a child, 
I've been rained on every time I went out..."

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
If all the passengers felt the same way I did at that moment...
Well, I couldn't just stand around and do nothing this time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I want everyone to know that even on rainy days or trips 
that aren't ideal, that they can still create great memories.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Everyone else was just kind enough
to go along with my selfishness. That’s all.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: (Quick recovery from being down and the determination to fight for others...)

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: (It’s no surprise that the others couldn’t leave her to do it alone... She really is a natural born leader. She’s seriously impressive.)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
W-We’re going to begin the fireworks display 
using fireworks images in the onboard theater 
s-shoo— Nngh, I bit my tongue... Hyaah?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, Doto-chan, I'll help with the fireworks display!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Man, I can already tell this is gonna be a great summer memory.
